class.name: Wolf and Saint
class.description: 主动技. 按 [LB/L1/F] to summon Wolf and Saint, your trusty combat drones. Wolf will roam and attack 敌人, while Saint will stay close to you and replenish your Health. Saint has a protective shield, but Wolf can be damaged by 敌人. 按 and hold [LB/L1/F] to recall Wolf and Saint and have some of your 冷却时间 refunded.

stats.name: Saint 恢复 2.5% 最大生命值/秒.

skills.name: Auxiliary Tanks
skills.description: 增加 Wolf and Saint's 持续时间 and 冷却时间 Rate.

stats.name: Wolf and Saint 持续时间: +[$] 秒
Wolf and Saint 冷却时间 Rate: +[$]%

skills.name: Fortify
skills.description: 增加 Max Health for you and Wolf. Additionally, while Saint is active you deal increased 伤害 with 所有枪械类型.

skills.name: Energize
skills.description: Saint Ability. Saint will occasionally boost the Shields of you and your friends. Additionally, Saint gains an increase to the rate which he 恢复 your health.

stats.name: Saint 恢复: +[$]% 最大生命值/秒.

skills.name: Heatsinks
skills.description: Improves Shield Recharge Rate and Shield Recharge Delay. This 加成 is doubled while Wolf and Saint are on 冷却时间.

skills.name: Termination Protocols
skills.description: Fight For Your Life is replaced by Termination Protocols. During Termination Protocols you can walk at a reduced speed, fire your weapons, and you constantly shock nearby 敌人. If the timer runs out, your power core goes critical, releasing a Nuclear Explosion.

stats.name: "I absolutely will not stop, ever, until you are dead."

skills.name: Rapid Reinforcement
skills.description: 击杀技. 击杀敌人 增加 your 冷却时间 Rate for Wolf and Saint and 增加 your Movement Speed and 装填速度 for a short time.

stats.name: 主动技 冷却时间 Rate: +[$]%

skills.name: Zero Hour
skills.description: Saint Ability. When Saint is recalled or expires, he explodes, deploying a Healing Zone underneath you. You and your friends Regenerate Health while standing in the zone.

stats.name: Healing Zone 持续时间: 12.0 秒
恢复 8.0% 最大生命值/秒.

skills.name: Hazmat Containment System
skills.description: If you have a 燃烧, Shock, or Corrosive Status Effect on you, you and your friends gain increased Resistance to that element. Additionally, you will occasionally spread that Status Effect to nearby 敌人 while it's active.

skills.name: Kinetic Armor
skills.description: 增加 your Maximum Health. Additionally, close range attackers have a chance to be struck by Explosive Feedback. The closer the 敌人 is to you the more likely he is to be struck.

skills.name: Hard To Kill
skills.description: Whenever you are shot or struck by an 敌人, you gain a stack of Hard To Kill, reducing all 伤害 received. All stacks are removed after a few 秒 of taking no 伤害.

skills.name: Overcharge
skills.description: Saint Ability. Immediately after being summoned, Saint will release an Energy Wave that will Overcharge you and any nearby friends for a short 持续时间. Overcharged players gain increased Movement Speed, 射速, 装填速度, and Ammo Regeneration.

skills.name: Laser Focus
skills.description: 增加 枪械伤害 and 弹夹容量 with all Laser Weapons.

skills.name: Man and Machine
skills.description: 增加 Shield Capacity and Maximum Health for you and Wolf.

skills.name: First to Fight
skills.description: 增加 your 枪械伤害. This 加成 is lost 5 秒 after you deal 伤害, and is regained after 5 秒 of you not dealing or taking 伤害.

skills.name: Targeting Scope
skills.description: 击杀技. 击杀敌人 gives you increased 精准度 and Critical 伤害 for a few 秒.

skills.name: Power Fist
skills.description:
Cyborg Augmentation: Arm.
Melee Override. 按 (RS/V) to perform an explosive punch with extended range. This ability has a 冷却时间.

stats.name: "I am now authorized to use physical force."

skills.name: Emergency Response
skills.description: Emergency Response is 启动d whenever your Shield becomes depleted, increasing your 射速 and 装填速度, and Wolf's 射速, for a short 持续时间. Your Shield must fully recharge between activations.

skills.name: Shock Absorbers
skills.description:
Cyborg Augmentation: Legs.
You can shoot while Sprinting. While doing so, you gain 加成 枪械伤害, and suffer no 精准度 penalties.

skills.name: Divert Power
skills.description: When your Shields are depleted and your Health is low, taking 伤害 causes you to gain massive Shield Regeneration and 伤害 Resistance for a few 秒. This ability has a 冷却时间.

skills.name: Meteor Slam
skills.description: 增加 the 伤害 Radius of your Slam ability.

skills.name: Welcome to the Gun Show
skills.description: You are better with guns in nearly every regard. 增加 枪械伤害, 装填速度, 弹夹容量, 精准度, and reduces Recoil.

skills.name: Vengeance Cannon
skills.description:
Cyborg Augmentation: Weapon.
Whenever your Shield becomes depleted, you 启动 your shoulder-mounted Vengeance Cannon. The Vengeance Cannon fires 燃烧 Laser Blasts in tandem with your equipped weapon and lasts for a short period of time. Your Shield must fully recharge between activations.

skills.name: Afterburner
skills.description: Wolf's Air Speed is increased. Additionally, your 装填速度 and Projectile Speed is increased.

skills.name: Fire Support
skills.description: 增加 your 伤害 with 所有枪械类型 and 增加 the 伤害 dealt by Wolf.

skills.name: Venom Bolts
skills.description: Wolf Ability. Wolf's shots have a chance to be Venom Bolts, which deal Corrosive 伤害. Additionally, you gain increased Corrode Chance and Corrode 伤害 with guns and grenades.

skills.name: Sup按ion
skills.description: 击杀技. 击杀敌人 gives you and Wolf increased 射速 for a short time.

skills.name: Laser Guided
skills.description: When you 启动 Wolf and Saint, or 按 [LB/L1/F] while they are active, Saint will Paint the target under your reticle. Wolf will focus attacks on the currently Painted target, and the target will receive increased 伤害 from all sources. If a target is killed while Painted, time will be added to Wolf and Saint's 持续时间.

stats.name: Wolf and Saint 持续时间 on Kill: +5 秒

skills.name: Rolling Thunder
skills.description: While Wolf is alive, you will periodically gain stacks of Rolling Thunder, increasing Wolf's 伤害.

skills.name: Kill Switch
skills.description: Wolf Ability. Whenever Wolf is recalled, runs out of Health, or expires, it will dive bomb 敌人 with explosive effect!

skills.name: Scramble
skills.description: When Wolf is destroyed, it is replaced once for free, and time will be added to Wolf and Saint's 持续时间.

skills.name: Cold War
skills.description: When you apply a Shock, 燃烧, or Corrosive status effect to an 敌人, there is a chance for the target to freeze. Additionally, you gain increased status effect chance when using Cryo weapons.

skills.name: Escalation
skills.description: 增加 your 暴击伤害. Additionally, 暴击 on 敌人 reduce the remaining 冷却时间 of Wolf and Saint by a small amount. This effect has a 冷却时间.

skills.name: Omega Strike
skills.description: Wolf Ability. Wolf periodically launches a deadly missile strike against its targets.

stats.name: "Too close for guns, I’m switching to missiles."
